        @Action(name="manipulateObject",layer=SCENE,description="Manipulates translation, rotation, scale and/or visibility of the given model",defaultDelay=0.0f,defaultRepeat=0,param={@Parameter(name="id",type="String",defaultValue="model01",description="ID of the model to manipulate"),@Parameter(name="setTranslationX",type="Float",defaultValue="0.0",description="Translate model to this x-coordinate"),@Parameter(name="setTranslationY",type="Float",defaultValue="0.0",description="Translate model to this y-coordinate"),@Parameter(name="setTranslationZ",type="Float",defaultValue="0.0",description="Translate model to this z-coordinate"),@Parameter(name="setRotationX",type="Float",defaultValue="0.0",description="Rotate model around x-axis"),@Parameter(name="setRotationY",type="Float",defaultValue="0.0",description="Rotate model around y-axis"),@Parameter(name="setRotationZ",type="Float",defaultValue="0.0",description="Rotate model around z-axis"),@Parameter(name="setScaleX",type="Float",defaultValue="1.0",description="Scale model to this y-coordinate"),@Parameter(name="setScaleZ",type="Float",defaultValue="1.0",description="Scale model to this z-coordinate"),@Parameter(name="addTranslationX",type="Float",defaultValue="0.0",description="Adds this value to the models       • resetCar

        @Action(name="resetCar",
        layer=SCENARIO,
        description="Moves the driving car to the given reset point",
        defaultDelay=0.0f,
        defaultRepeat=0,
        param=@Parameter(name="resetPointID",type="String",defaultValue="resetPoint01",description="ID of the reset point to move the driving car to"))
public TriggerAction resetCar(SimulationBasics sim,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       float delay,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       int repeat,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       java.util.Properties parameterList)
        Creates a ResetCar trigger action by parsing the node list for the name of the reset point to place the car when the trigger was hit.
        Parameters:
        sim - Simulator.
        delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
        repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
        parameterList - List of additional parameters.
        Returns:
        ResetCar trigger action with the name of the reset point to move the car to.

      • moveTraffic

        @Action(name="moveTraffic",layer=SCENARIO,description="Moves a traffic vehicle to the given way point",defaultDelay=0.0f,defaultRepeat=0,param={@Parameter(name="trafficObjectID",type="String",defaultValue="trafficObject01",description="ID of the traffic vehicle to move"),@Parameter(name="wayPointID",type="String",defaultValue="wayPoint01",description="ID of the way point to move the traffic vehicle to")})
public TriggerAction moveTraffic(SimulationBasics sim,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           float delay,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           int repeat,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           java.util.Properties parameterList)
        Creates a MoveTraffic trigger action list by parsing the node list for the name of the traffic object to move and the ID of the target way point.
        Parameters:
        sim - Simulator.
        delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
        repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
        parameterList - List of additional parameters.
        Returns:
        MoveTraffic trigger action list with name of the traffic object(s) and ID of the way point.

      • startPresentationTask

        public TriggerAction startPresentationTask(SimulationBasics sim,
                                           float delay,
                                           int repeat,
                                           java.util.Properties parameterList)
        Creates a PresentationTask trigger action by parsing the node list for SIM-TD presentation models. As soon as the trigger is hit, the presentation task will be displayed in the HMI GUI.
        Parameters:
        sim - Simulator.
        delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
        repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
        parameterList - List of additional parameters.
        Returns:
        PresentationTask trigger action with the presentation model.

      • setCurrentSpeedLimit

        @Action(name="setCurrentSpeedLimit",
        layer=SCENARIO,
        description="Sets the speed limit to the given value",
        defaultDelay=0.0f,
        defaultRepeat=0,
        param=@Parameter(name="speedLimit",type="Integer",defaultValue="0",description="Speed limit in kph (0 = unlimited)"))
public TriggerAction setCurrentSpeedLimit(SimulationBasics sim,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              float delay,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              int repeat,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              java.util.Properties parameterList)
        Creates a SetSpeedLimit trigger action by parsing the given node list. This trigger sets the global variable "currentSpeedLimit" (e.g. used by the simulator's speed indicator) to the given value.
        Parameters:
        sim - Simulator.
        delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
        repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
        parameterList - List of additional parameters.
        Returns:
        SetSpeedLimit trigger action with the given speed limit value.

      • setUpcomingSpeedLimit

        @Action(name="setUpcomingSpeedLimit",
        layer=SCENARIO,
        description="Sets the upcoming speed limit to the given value",
        defaultDelay=0.0f,
        defaultRepeat=0,
        param=@Parameter(name="speedLimit",type="Integer",defaultValue="0",description="Speed limit in kph (0 = unlimited)"))
public TriggerAction setUpcomingSpeedLimit(SimulationBasics sim,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         float delay,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         int repeat,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         java.util.Properties parameterList)
        Creates a SetSpeedLimit trigger action by parsing the given node list. This trigger sets the global variable "upcomingSpeedLimit" (e.g. used by the RoadWorksInformation presentation model) to the given value.
        Parameters:
        sim - Simulator.
        delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
        repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
        parameterList - List of additional parameters.
        Returns:
        SetSpeedLimit trigger action with the given speed limit value.

      • measureTimeUntilBrake

        @Action(name="measureTimeUntilBrake",
        layer=SCENARIO,
        description="Measures time until brake was applied",
        defaultDelay=0.0f,
        defaultRepeat=0,
        param=@Parameter(name="triggerName",type="String",defaultValue="trigger01",description="ID of trigger for identification in output file"))
public TriggerAction measureTimeUntilBrake(SimulationBasics sim,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   float delay,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   int repeat,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.util.Properties parameterList)
        Creates a GetTimeUntilBrake trigger action by parsing the given node list. Time from hitting the trigger until the driver brakes will be recorded.
        Parameters:
        sim - Simulator.
        delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
        repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
        parameterList - List of additional parameters.
        Returns:
        GetTimeUntilBrake trigger action.

      • measureTimeUntilSpeedChange

        @Action(name="measureTimeUntilSpeedChange",layer=SCENARIO,description="Measures time until speed was changed by the given amount",defaultDelay=0.0f,defaultRepeat=0,param={@Parameter(name="triggerName",type="String",defaultValue="trigger01",description="ID of trigger for identification in output file"),@Parameter(name="speedChange",type="Integer",defaultValue="20",description="Amount of speed (in kph) that has to be in- or decreased")})
public TriggerAction measureTimeUntilSpeedChange(SimulationBasics sim,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          float delay,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          int repeat,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          java.util.Properties parameterList)
        Creates a GetTimeUntilSpeedChange trigger action by parsing the given node list. Time from hitting the trigger until the car reached the given speed change.
        Parameters:
        sim - Simulator.
        delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
        repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
        parameterList - List of additional parameters.
        Returns:
        GetTimeUntilSpeedChange trigger action.

      • requestGreenTrafficLight

        @Action(name="requestGreenTrafficLight",
        layer=INTERACTION,
        description="Requests a given traffic light to turn green",
        defaultDelay=0.0f,
        defaultRepeat=0,
        param=@Parameter(name="trafficLightID",type="String",defaultValue="TrafficLight10",description="ID of traffic light to request for green"))
public TriggerAction requestGreenTrafficLight(SimulationBasics sim,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    float delay,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    int repeat,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    java.util.Properties parameterList)
        Requests the given traffic light to turn green. All conflicting traffic lights will turn red before.
        Parameters:
        sim - Simulator.
        delay - Amount of seconds (float) to wait before the TriggerAction will be executed.
        repeat - Number of maximum repetitions (0 = infinite).
        parameterList - List of additional parameters.
        Returns:
        RequestGreenTrafficLight trigger action.
